parsedResult.explanation: The 'Add to Cart' button has been removed from the CTA section. This change simplifies the product page by removing the direct purchase action, potentially directing users to more information or a curated buying experience.

metadata.name: Product Showcase (No Cart Button)
metadata.description: A product showcase template without the 'Add to Cart' button, focusing on product details and information.
